metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9893 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: drivers/video/msm/mdss/mdss_mdp_pp.c in the Qualcomm components in Androidbefore 2016-08-05 on Nexus 5 devices does not properly determine the sizeof Gamut LUT data, which allows attackers to obtain sensitive informationvia a crafted application, aka Android internal bug 28747914 and Qualcomminternal bug CR542223.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
